original_text: And God did so that night; and it was dry on the fleece only, and on all the ground there was dew.
korean_text: 그 밤에 하나님이 그대로 행하시니 곧 양털만 마르고 그 주변 땅에는 다 이슬이 있었더라

sentences.original_text: And God did so that night
and it was dry on the fleece only
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 양털 뭉치 위에는 마른 것뿐이었습니다

sentences.original_text: and on all the ground there was dew
